title: Stop using Twitter to log in to other websites
description: With Twitter's growing technical problems, you can't rely on it as your single sign-on for other sites.

title: How to view your saved passwords in MacOS
description: Here's what to do when you want to access any of the saved passwords on your MacOS device.

title: Eye-popping: Images project grim health future for delivery drivers
description: This is what happens when you ask AI to create a picture of delivery drivers 25 years from now.

title: The 5 best smart TVs of 2022
description: A smart TV can improve your viewing experience and simplify your life, too. Ditch the screen you've been using for one of the best smart TVs for your home or office.

title: How to configure apps to start upon login with MacOS
description: Here's how to make the MacOS desktop experience even more efficient by adding apps as Login Items for faster access, so they automatically start when you log in.

title: This Alexa-controlled fan is the smart home luxury I didn't know I needed
description: The Govee Smart Tower Fan lets you get your environment just right, with minimal effort.

title: The 5 best wireless surround sound systems of 2022
description: Whether you're watching a movie or listening to Taylor Swift's latest album, an excellent sound system can take your listening to the next level. Check out our top picks for the best wireless surround sound systems.

title: What is Artemis? Everything you need to know about NASA's new moon mission
description: NASA is embarking on a yearslong, multistage, groundbreaking mission to the moon. Here's why NASA is returning to the moon, who's going, what technology is enabling the mission, and more.

title: Artemis mission: How you can track Orion's trip to the moon in real time
description: On Wednesday, NASA finally launched the Artemis mission into space, and now you can track it its journey.

title: Low-code is not a cure for overworked IT departments just yet
description: Survey says low-code and no-code platforms haven't quite made a dent yet in relieving overworked development shops. But that's no reason to look at the long-term benefits this approach.

title: Fitbit goodies for Pixel Watch and Google goodies for Fitbits
description: The sleep profile feature is coming to the Google Pixel Watch, while Google Maps and Wallet are launching on the Fitbit Sense 2 and Versa 4.

title: How to activate a new iPhone
description: If you've recently purchased a new iPhone to be shipped to your home, you're probably wondering how you're going to get it up and running.

title: How to never lose your keys again
description: This holder for your AirTag doubles as a key organizer, so it will keep your keys a bit more tidy. Maybe.

title: How to use iPhone 14's new emergency SOS text via satellite feature
description: Apple's iPhone 14 got an important new feature today. You can now text emergency responders for help via satellite in areas without any cell coverage.

title: 12 gift ideas for coffee lovers this holiday season
description: Real coffee lovers usually prefer a well-crafted espresso or homemade latte over Starbucks. Save your money on a wasted gift card, and, instead elevate your coffee-lovers' caffeine ritual.

title: Microsoft, Nvidia partner to build a massive AI supercomputer in the cloud
description: The partnership makes Microsoft Azure the first public cloud to incorporate Nvidia's full AI stack -- its GPUs, networking, and AI software.

title: Thanks to open source, 5G cracks 50% of the telecom market
description: While it's invisible to users, open-source software underlays all of 5G.

title: The 2022 M2 Apple iPad Pro is my (drone) copilot
description: From planning the drone flight to editing the video, the new iPad Pro can handle everything.

title: Microsoft is dropping these Office Mobile app features
description: Ahead of the big Microsoft 365 rebrand of the Office app, Microsoft is dropping these file-sharing options.

title: FBI warning: PC and tech support scams are back. Here's what to watch out for
description: Scammers try to convince victims they're about to lose hundreds of dollars through a service payment - then use remote access software to get into their PCs.

title: We have liftoff: NASA's Artemis rocket launches, and Orion is headed to the Moon
description: After multiple setbacks, the Artemis I mission's Space Launch System has lifted off, with Orion now on its way around the Moon.

title: Black Friday online shopping: How to boost your cybersecurity and stay safe from scammers
description: Black Friday offers opportunities to bag discount deals - and cyber criminals know online shoppers might let their guard down in the rush.

title: Most workers are thinking of quitting. The real surprise is what's forcing them leave
description: Employees want to develop their skills, but employers are holding them back.

title: Technology spending will rise next year. And this old favourite is still a top priority
description: IT spending is surging ahead despite fears for the wider economy. And one area of tech is likely to be a key focus for investment.

title: This giant supercomputer dominates the rankings, and catching it will take a lot of work
description: The US-based Frontier HPE Cray supercomputer is a long way ahead of other supercomputers around the world.

title: Singapore to host first Olympic Esports Week in 2023
description: Asian country will play host to competitors at the inaugural Olympic Esports Week to be held over four days next June.

title: Black Friday deal: This large Gigabyte curved gaming monitor just dropped to $369
description: You can enjoy $80 off a large, curved gaming monitor ahead of Black Friday, courtesy of Newegg.

title: Five Asean nations ink pact to ease cross-border payments
description: Central banks of Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, and the Philippines have signed an agreement to boost connectivity and facilitate speedier and "more transparent" cross-border payments.
